title: Add 30 new prompts (Video, Photo, Ads, Social Media) and show them in the Prompt Library

requirements.text: Create 30 new high-quality AI prompt records in English across the following backend prompt categories: videoGeneration (video), photoGeneration (photo), cgiAds (ads), and socialMedia (social media). Each prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags[], and boolean flags isPopular, isNew, isPremium.

quotes: Add 30 high-quality AI prompts across video, photo, ads, and social media categories.

acceptanceCriteria: There are exactly 30 new PromptRecord entries authored in English and assigned to these categories only: videoGeneration, photoGeneration, cgiAds, socialMedia.
Each new prompt has non-empty title, description, and fullText; tags is a non-empty array of useful keywords.
All 30 prompts have unique titles (no duplicates).

requirements.text: Persist the 30 new prompts in the canister so they are returned by getAllPrompts and appear in the prompt library on the frontend. The addition must be idempotent (re-running the addition logic must not create duplicates).

quotes: Save them and display them in the prompt library.

acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, getAllPrompts returns the previous prompts plus 30 additional prompts (no duplicates).
The Prompt Library page shows the increased prompt count and renders the newly added prompts in the grid.
Filtering by category (Video Generation, Photo Generation, CGI Ads, Social Media) shows the newly added prompts in the correct category.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication providers (Internet Identity remains the only auth).
Do not redesign the prompt library UI beyond what is required to make the new prompts visible.
Do not add new prompt categories beyond videoGeneration, photoGeneration, cgiAds, and socialMedia.
